recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Fish Curry
recipes.method: 1.Marinate the fish with spices. 2.Fry the fish in oil.3.Make curry by adding water to the fish mixed with spices.

recipes.title: Egg Curry
recipes.method: 1.Chop some onions and put it in the pan at low heat for 5 min.2.Boil some eggs.3.Put some spices in the onion and add water to it and add the eggs in it.
